name: Example schema v1.0.0
description: Sample schema to demostrate a TAG layout

roles.name: trainer
roles.description: It consumes the data and trains local model

roles.name: aggregator
roles.description: It aggregates the updates from trainers

roles.name: global_aggregator
roles.description: It aggregates the updates from all the aggregators and builds a global model

channels.name: param-channel
channels.description: Model update is sent from trainer to aggregator and vice-versa

channels.name: global-channel
channels.description: Model update is sent from all aggregators to the global aggregator and vice-versa
